Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_7umkshw8&referenceId=1_7umkshw8&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: U.S. equity markets powered higher on Monday, in parallel with rising oil prices and U.S. Treasury yields. Tesla led the way up in early trading, after reporting stronger-than-expected quarterly deliveries of its electric cars.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3mRIXl2
